text: Phira'ā'unara banśadhara ārau siham̐tara pūrbarartīsakalara abhyāsara daraē iham̐tē nija pratipālakara āẏātasamūhaka asbīkāra karaichila. Phalata siham̐tara pāpakarmara bābē āmi siham̐taka dhbansa karaichō ārau phira'ā'unara banśadharasakalaka ḍubā'i māraichō; ārau siham̐ta āṭāẏē āchila yālima
